description._content: Description: Broadcasting from the new studios of the Aden Broadcasting Service, which were opened in 1958. Location: Aden, Yemen Date: 1956-1960 Our Catalogue Reference: Part of CO 1069/693 This image is part of the Colonial Office photographic collection held at The National Archives. Feel free to share it within the spirit of the Commons Please use the comments section below the pictures to share any information you have about the people, places or events shown. We have attempted to provide place information for the images automatically but our software may not have found the correct location. For high quality reproductions of any item from our collection please contact our image library
